hero.name: Juan Carlos
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer creating innovative solutions with modern technologies

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Developer & Problem Solver
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer specialized in JavaScript, TypeScript and Python, with a particular focus on creating accessible and usable interfaces. I have experience developing modern web applications with React, Express.js and relational databases.
about.journey: My passion for software development centers on implementing clean architecture and clean code. I constantly seek to learn new technologies like Artificial Intelligence, DevOps and Cybersecurity, while automating tasks with Bash and Python scripts.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills in various technologies and frameworks.

vetCareFrontend.title: Vet-Care Frontend
vetCareFrontend.description: Developed the user interface for veterinary appointment management, including dashboards for users and veterinarians, using React and Tailwind CSS.

vetCareBackend.title: Vet-Care Backend
vetCareBackend.description: Implemented RESTful API for business logic and data management with MySQL, plus implementation with Node.js, Express, Sequelize and JWT security.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Developed my web portfolio created primarily to showcase my work, deployed on Netlify, built with a predefined color palette and minimalist design using React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.

stack.title: My Tech Stack
stack.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life. Always learning and adapting to new technologies.
stack.learningDescription: The tech world evolves rapidly, and I'm committed to staying updated with the latest trends, best practices, and emerging technologies. I regularly explore new frameworks, attend tech conferences, and contribute to open-source projects to enhance my skills and give back to the community.

footer.description: Creating innovative digital solutions with passion and precision. Let's build something amazing together.
footer.availability: Available for freelance work and collaboration opportunities.
